articles.title: Why Services Are Central to Mastercard's Evolving Growth Story
articles.mainIdea: Why Services Are Central to Mastercard's Evolving Growth Story
articles.summary: Zacks: Why Services Are Central to Mastercard's Evolving Growth Story. Mastercard's growing Services business is emerging as a key growth engine, diversifying revenues, boosting resilience and strengthening its long-term strategy. Related tickers mentioned: AXP, V.

articles.title: Mastercard partners Tencent MIDAS for digital payment transformation
articles.mainIdea: Mastercard partners Tencent MIDAS for digital payment transformation
articles.summary: Electronic Payments: Mastercard partners Tencent MIDAS for digital payment transformation. Under the agreement, Mastercard’s “Click to Pay” and tokenisation will be embedded into Tencent MIDAS’s cross-border payment offerings. Related tickers mentioned: TCEHY.
